name: Melabu WP Auto Text Typing
author: Samet Tarim aka prod3v3loper

sections.description:
Melabu WP Auto Text Typing

The Melabu WP Auto Text Typing is designed as an assisting WordPress user plugin.
With this plugin, you can automate any text can tap. You can set the color and the shape.

And many more… Check it out !

FREE

Functionality

  • Types your text automatically
  • Very easy to use

Options

  • Custom Background Color with colorpicker
  • Custom Color with colorpicker
  • Custom Border-radius
  • Custom Border-width
  • Custom Border-style

TESTED

Works with all Major Browsers

  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Google Chrome
  • Opera
  • Safari
  • Internet Explorer

Successfully tested with this Themes:

  • Twenty Ten
  • Twenty Eleven
  • Twenty Twelve
  • Twenty Thirteen
  • Twenty Fourteen
  • Twenty Fifteen
  • Twenty Sixteen

NOTE

SHORTCODE

  • [wp_mb_plugin_typing]…Here comes the selected typing text…[/wp_mb_plugin_typing]

SUPPORT

  • For Support all (default English): Support

FEEDBACK

  • Development is fueled by your praise and feedback.

In like please support us so that we can continue to develop this plugin regularly.
In how you can support us so that we can further develop this plugin regularly, it may not always be financially, so you will give us feedback or recommend us, please give us a review, Liken our Facebook page or sponsor us, so that we further useful free plugins can develop.
You see, it is much more possible if you want to support something, thanks to all the Support Us.

Translations

  • English: Default, always included!
  • German: Deutsch – immer dabei!
  • Turkey: Türkçe – herzaman!

Note:
All my plugins are localized/ translateable by default.
This is very important for all users worldwide.
So please contribute your language to the plugin to make it even more useful.
For translating I recommend the awesome “MeliBu WP Auto Text Typing” and for validating the “Poedit Editor”.

Additional Info

Idea Behind
Help people have leightweight plugin with all features…

Credits

  • THX all translaters.

SEO CMS & prod3v3loper & SEO Hamburg
sections.installation:
WordPress installation:

Install Melabu WP Auto Text Typing via the plugin directory:

WordPress (Admin-Backend)

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > search for auto text typing
  2. Press Install Now for the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing
  3. Press Activate Plugin

or by uploading the files automaticlly to WP Plugin Directory:

WordPress (Admin-Backend)

  1. Download the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New > Install
  3. Upload the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing directory zip
  4. Press Install Now for the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing plugin
  5. Press Activate Plugin

or by uploading the files manually to WP Plugin Directory:

Manually (FTP)

  1. Download the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing
  2. Unzip the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing (auto-text-typing) zip file
  3. Open your FTP Client to your Website
  4. Upload the Melabu WP Auto Text Typing directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  5. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu

Problems installing and updating ?

If there are problems with the installation or update, deactivate and then activate dishwasher again.
If that does not help then remove plug and re-install the newest version.
sections.faq:
Can I change colors?

Yes, you can change colors with the colorpicker

Note: For another questions please contact us.

Version 1.0
